title: ‘It just went off’: Why father who shot British daughter won’t face jail—what's Trump link?
summary_full: A British woman, Lucy Harrison, was fatally shot by her father in Texas during a prank. Her father, Kris Harrison, pointed a loaded handgun at her, believing it was unloaded. While US authorities ruled the death an accident, a UK coroner concluded it was unlawful killing. The family is seeking justice for Lucy.
